translation.en: [panting] I'm on the surface. I'm on the surface.
[yells] The sun!
I looked at the sun! I'll go blind!
translation.fr:
J'ai regardé le soleil !
Je vais être aveugle !

translation.en: Wait, I can still see.
[exclaims] I can't be here. I can't be here. I can't be here.
Out of my way, rocks!
Dad! Can you hear me?
[sighs] Of course not. He could be miles away.
translation.fr: Bien sûr que non. Il doit être loin.

translation.en: OK. [inhales sharply] You can do this, Kipo.
You got this.
Humans lived on the surface for thousands of years.
translation.fr:
Les humains ont vécu à la surface
pendant des millénaires.

translation.en: You can handle a few minutes up here.
translation.fr: Je peux bien tenir quelques minutes.

translation.en: You just have to find your way home.
translation.fr: Je dois juste retrouver mon chemin.

translation.en: Flowers.
A lot bigger than they are in books.
translation.fr: Plus grosses que dans les livres.

translation.en: ♪ Up on top, on my own ♪
♪ A human girl so far from home ♪
translation.fr: Une fille loin de chez elle

translation.en: ♪ The flowers are big ♪
♪ The bees are weird ♪
♪ It's dangerous ♪
♪ Just like I feared ♪
♪ On the surface world ♪
Stay away!
Hmm... Let's see, the current took me left, then right.
translation.fr:
Voyons. Le courant m'a emportée à gauche
puis à droite.

translation.en: And then there was the long part.
translation.fr: Puis il y a eu le long passage.

translation.en: [stammering] And the... And the short part.
And then the loop-dee-do.
And then I went way over here, so, my home must be in this direction.
translation.fr:
Ensuite, je suis partie tout là-bas,
ma maison doit être par là.

translation.en: Or was it left, then loop-dee-do?
translation.fr: Ou bien à gauche et après, les boucles ?

translation.en: Or... or... loop-dee-do, then left?
translation.fr: Ou les boucles et après, à gauche ?

translation.en: [gasps] Who are you, little one?
You're adorable.
Uh, sorry.
Didn't expect you to come with extra eyes.
translation.fr: J'ai été surprise par les yeux en plus.

translation.en: I'm a friend.
Oh! You come with an extra pair of everything!
translation.fr: Tu as plein de trucs en plus !

translation.en: I only have two legs. So boring.
translation.fr: Je n'ai que deux jambes. C'est nul.

translation.en: -I have to pet you. -[squealing]
[Kipo] Wait! Come back!
You can run, pig. But I will find you, and I will pet you.
translation.fr:
Enfuis-toi, cochon. Mais je te retrouverai
et je te caresserai.

translation.en: I somehow feel like I've been wearing you my whole life.
translation.fr:
J'ai l'impression d'avoir porté ça
toute ma vie.

translation.en: Piggy!
I can help you with that.
We have vending machines like this in my burrow.
translation.fr: Il y a des distributeurs dans mon terrier.

translation.en: I know all the tricks.
There's a wire back here.
translation.fr: Il y a un fil derrière.

translation.en: If I could just get to it.
That works, too.
Whoa! You were hungry, weren't you?
Hey, wanna try something fun?
You ready?
Humans from the old world.
This is a school!
I go to school, too.
Underground with lots of other kids.
translation.fr: Sous terre avec plein d'autres enfants.

translation.en: No windows, though. My father teaches there.
translation.fr: Mais sans fenêtres. Mon père est prof.

translation.en: "Kipo, how many light years are in a parsec?"
Although, a lot of good that does me up here.
translation.fr: Mais ça me sert à rien, ici.

translation.en: My whole life they taught us the surface was this horrible place.
translation.fr:
On m'a toujours dit
que la surface était un endroit horrible.

translation.en: -But look at you. -[snorting]
You look just like these dumplings my dad makes.
translation.fr: Tu ressembles aux raviolis de mon papa.

translation.en: They're called "mandu."
[gasps] That's it! I'm gonna call you "Mandu."
I'm gonna get you!
-[squealing] -I'm gonna get you, Mandu!
Mandu, I have to pet this bunny, now.
translation.fr: Je dois absolument caresser ce lapin.

translation.en: It's gonna be OK.
Hi, there. Aren't you fluffy.
Oh, you like that.
Oh! There's another one.
translation.fr: Il y en a un autre.

translation.en: OK, OK! Everyone wait your turn.
You're all so soft, but there's only one of me.
translation.fr:
Vous êtes super doux,
mais je suis toute seule.

translation.en: And that must be the mother.
Mandu!
Can you talk, mute?
I'm no barbarian. If a mute can talk, it's not chow.
translation.fr:
Je suis pas une barbare.
Un mutant qui parle, je le mange pas.

translation.en: All I need to hear is one little "yes."
-[squeals] -A human?
Sorry, but a girl's gotta eat.
translation.fr: Désolée, mais une fille doit manger.

translation.en: Wait! [grunts]
I was wondering when you were gonna come out of there.
translation.fr: Je me demandais quand tu sortirais de là.

translation.en: You're human! On the surface.
translation.fr: Tu es humaine ! À la surface.

translation.en: You don't miss a thing, do you?
-[Mandu squealing] -[gasps] Wait. You can't eat my friend.
translation.fr: Attends. Ne mange pas mon ami.

translation.en: If you want a bacon sandwich, go catch your own pig.
translation.fr: Si tu as faim, chasse ton propre cochon.

translation.en: I already called dibs on this one.
-Mandu is no sandwich! -She's about to be.
translation.fr:
- Mandu n'est pas un sandwich !
- Ça ne va pas tarder.

translation.en: [gasps] Say, your staff is so pointy.
translation.fr: Hé, ton truc est super pointu.

translation.en: -Where'd you get it from? -Off a giant scorpion.
translation.fr:
- Tu l'as trouvé où ?
- Sur un scorpion géant.

translation.en: It was trespassing in my camp.
translation.fr: Il était rentré dans mon camp.

translation.en: -[squealing] -Oh, no, you don't!
-Hey! Run, Mandu! -Let go!
What is wrong with you?
Now we're both out of a meal.
How can you eat her? She's adorable!
translation.fr:
Tu ne peux pas la manger.
Elle est trop mignonne !

translation.en: I've eaten plenty of adorable.
translation.fr: J'ai mangé plein de trucs mignons.

translation.en: And there's lots more adorable that's tried to eat me.
translation.fr: Et beaucoup ont essayé de me manger.

translation.en: Do you have any hand sanitizer?
You must not be from around here.
Are you one of those underground mole people?
You've heard of us!
I didn't think there were any humans left up here anymore.
translation.fr: Il y a encore des humains ici ?

translation.en: For your lost lunch.
Listen, I'm trying to find my way home.
translation.fr: Écoute, j'essaie de rentrer chez moi.

translation.en: You clearly look like you grew up around here.
translation.fr: Tu as l'air d'avoir grandi par ici.

translation.en: Maybe you could help me find...
it.
[grunting] Kipo. My name's Kipo.
And... and I really need your help right now.
translation.fr: Et j'ai vraiment besoin de toi.

translation.en: You're not gone? That's annoying.
translation.fr: Tu es encore là ? C'est pénible.

translation.en: Look, there was a mute-quake.
translation.fr: Il y a eu un séis-mutant.

translation.en: A lot of people I care about could be hurt.
translation.fr:
Les gens que j'aime
sont peut-être blessés.

translation.en: I really need to get home.
Not my problem.
First lesson of the surface: Up here, you don't shout like that.
translation.fr:
Leçon n°1 de la surface :
on ne crie pas comme ça ici.

translation.en: It's called "ringing the dinner bell."
Free advice.
Hey, you, wolf girl!
Yeah! You, walking away from me!
I'm still talking to you!
Fine. I don't need you anyway.
translation.fr: Très bien. Je n'ai pas besoin de toi.

translation.en: Oh, hi. You look friendly.
That's your last freebie.
Fine. I'll just go this way instead.
Really? You're just gonna walk right into Death Ivy?
translation.fr:
Sérieux ? Tu fonces
vers les ronces du trépas ?

translation.en: [groans] You're not gonna last five minutes.
Look, I'll help you get home.
translation.fr: Je vais t'aider à rentrer chez toi.

translation.en: But once you're back, I'm out.
-Up here, I work alone. Got it? -Oh, thank you!
translation.fr:
- Ici, je travaille seule. Compris ?
- Merci !

translation.en: No hugging.
I knew you were a good person.
translation.fr: Je savais que tu étais sympa.

translation.en: Hey, I just realized I don't know your name.
translation.fr: Mais je connais même pas ton prénom.

translation.en: -No talking! -Uh, OK.
I'll just call you "Wolf", then.
I've already been calling you that in my head.
translation.fr: J'ai choisi ça dès le début.

translation.en: At first we thought it was a mute passing overhead.
translation.fr: On a cru qu'un mutant passait.

translation.en: I mean, that happens all the time, right?
We learned a long time ago to anchor all tall furniture.
translation.fr: On fixe tous les gros meubles.

translation.en: But this one was, like, an earthquake. I can't imagine how big it was.
translation.fr:
Mais là, c'était comme
un énorme tremblement de terre.

translation.en: It made an entire cliff fall... while I was on it.
translation.fr:
La falaise s'est effondrée,
avec moi dessus.

translation.en: And then, I landed in the water supply tube and nearly drowned.
translation.fr:
J'ai atterri dans l'aqueduc
et j'ai failli me noyer.

translation.en: [gulps] Sounds like a Tuesday.
Listen, Kipo, was it?
Lesson two of the surface: Don't ever tell anyone that story.
translation.fr:
Leçon n°2 de la surface :
ne raconte plus jamais ça.

translation.en: It could be very dangerous if people know you're from a burrow.
translation.fr: C'est dangereux de venir d'un terrier.

translation.en: And lesson three of the surface: Up here, you never pass up a meal.
translation.fr:
Et leçon n°3 :
ici, ne saute jamais un repas.

translation.en: Crispy on the outside, chewy in the center.
translation.fr: Croquant à l'extérieur, mou à l'intérieur.

translation.en: Can you tell me anything about your burrow that might help us find it?
translation.fr:
Parle-moi de ton terrier
pour m'aider à le retrouver.

translation.en: Oh, well, there's the underground irrigation system...
translation.fr: Il y a le système d'irrigation souterrain,

translation.en: which is underground.
[gasps] Oh, wait! The Clover!
How could I forget the Clover?
We live under this barrier called The Great Clover.
translation.fr:
On vit sous une barrière
appelée le Grand Trèfle.

translation.en: I've never actually seen it, but we use it as our city emblem.
translation.fr:
Je ne l'ai jamais vue,
mais c'est l'emblème de notre ville.

translation.en: Hmm. I may know what that is.
translation.fr: Je crois savoir ce que c'est.

translation.en: We'll make camp here for the night.
translation.fr: On va camper ici cette nuit.

translation.en: For the night... out here?
Uh, my dad must be really worried about me right now, so...
translation.fr: Mon père doit être super inquiet, alors...

translation.en: Uh, did you hear that? Because I definitely did.
translation.fr: Tu as entendu ? Moi, j'ai entendu.

translation.en: It feels like something we should worry about.
So many sparkles! I was not prepared.
translation.fr:
Il y a tant d'étincelles.
Je ne savais pas.

translation.en: Why would humans stay underground
when every night they could look up and see this?
Yeah, it's a real paradise.
That must be the Big Dipper! It's part of Ursa Major.
translation.fr: Ça doit être la Grande Ourse !

translation.en: I'm kind of an astronomy buff even though I've never seen a sky before.
translation.fr:
Je suis fan d'astronomie,
même si c'est mon premier ciel.

translation.en: Ooh! And that bright one, that's Polaris!
translation.fr: Et la brillante, c'est l'Étoile polaire !

translation.en: You see the one that doesn't make any noise?
translation.fr: Tu vois celle qui fait aucun bruit ?

translation.en: Well, none of them make... Oh.
[chuckles nervously] OK. I'll be quiet.
You get sleep.
[gasps] Aries! That's my birth sign.
translation.fr: Le Bélier ! C'est mon signe astrologique.

translation.en: I've always wanted to see it!
It's supposed to be a ram if you connect the dots.
translation.fr:
Ça forme un bélier
quand tu relies les points.

translation.en: I guess you can kinda see it if you squint right--
translation.fr: En louchant, tu le vois mieux...

translation.en: -[Wolf] Kipo! -Oh, right.
Anything that looks useful, take.
translation.fr: Prends tout ce qui peut être utile.

translation.en: "October 23rd, 2020."
Yeah, it's expired by about 200 years.
translation.fr: Oui, il est périmé depuis 200 ans.

translation.en: -Found it! -Spot remover?
That's for getting out shirt stains.
translation.fr: Pour enlever les taches à sec.

translation.en: No offense, yours may need a full spin cycle.
translation.fr:
Mais ton t-shirt aurait besoin
d'un lavage en machine.

translation.en: Mega Bunny.
It's a good thing we're inside-- [yells]
-Whoa! -Definitely a Mega Bunny.
I saw that same Mega Bunny earlier.
translation.fr: Je l'ai vue tout à l'heure.

translation.en: I named her "Rabbecka." The little ones are so cuddly!
translation.fr:
Je l'ai appelée Lapinou.
Ses petits sont super câlins !

translation.en: You touched the babies?
Why did you touch the babies?
Don't you know you can't touch the babies?!
But they were so cute. [yells]
Aisle six, baking goods. Aisle seven, drinks.
translation.fr:
Allée six, pâtisserie.
Allée sept, boissons.

translation.en: Aisle eight, bingo!
Pretty sure you got the baby scent off me.
translation.fr: C'est bon, l'odeur des bébés est partie !

translation.en: You can't be too careful.
Huh? Oh, all out. Oh, thank goodness!
It's a good thing I found this second bottle.
[groans] You've gotta be kidding me!
-[coughing] -This one's Summer Rain.
That is way better than taking the stairs!
translation.fr:
C'est drôlement mieux
que prendre l'escalier !

translation.en: If you run into anything, act like you're from the surface.
translation.fr:
Si on rencontre quoi que ce soit,
fais comme si tu étais d'ici.

translation.en: From the surface. Got it.
Uh, what are you doing?
[deep voice] I'm from the surface, where life is hard.
translation.fr: La vie est difficile à la surface.

translation.en: You gotta be tough as nails.
translation.fr: Il faut être un dur à cuire.

translation.en: Iron and fire... wearing dead animals.
translation.fr:
Comme le métal et le feu...
porter des animaux morts.

translation.en: Good. You're catching on.
This is my angry surface face.
translation.fr: Voici mon regard noir de la surface.

translation.en: Hmm. [normal voice] Whoa, what's that?
[gasps] There's so much to see when you're not in a cave!
translation.fr: Il y a tant de choses à voir ici !

translation.en: Focus, Kipo.
[Kipo gasps] That must be it!
It looks just like the clover in our emblem.
translation.fr: Ça ressemble au trèfle de notre emblème.

translation.en: Wow. So, that's my home.
It's half a day's walk from here,
translation.fr: C'est à une demi-journée de marche,

translation.en: but we'll have to get over Skyscraper Ridge.
translation.fr:
mais faut passer
la chaîne de gratte-ciels.

translation.en: -[Kipo] That looks dangerous. -[Wolf] It is.
translation.fr:
- Ça a l'air dangereux.
- Ça l'est.

translation.en: I'm really sticking my neck out for you. And for what?
translation.fr:
Je prends de gros risques pour toi.
Et pourquoi ?

translation.en: I wish I knew how to repay you.
Or if you wanted to come stay with me,
translation.fr: Si tu voulais venir vivre chez moi,

translation.en: I'm sure there'd be a place for you in my burrow.
translation.fr: on te ferait de la place dans mon terrier.

translation.en: And go all soft and mushy like the rest of you mole people?
translation.fr:
Pour devenir ramollo
comme tous les humains taupes ?

translation.en: No, thanks.
Humans.
[gasps] My shirt!
[pants] It won't come out!
[groaning] It's setting!
[panting] Careful! That's one of the Mod Frogs.
You do not wanna mess with them.
You're a talking frog!
I mean, I've seen tons of talking frogs before...
translation.fr:
J'ai déjà vu
des tas de grenouilles qui parlent...

translation.en: that wear suits.
No... No biggie.
What my friend here means to say is, we have this!
translation.fr: Mon amie veut dire qu'on a ça !

translation.en: Spot remover! Give it to me!
translation.fr: Un détachant à sec ! Donne-moi ça !

translation.en: If you let us go.
[gasps] Look, this is my private office.
Was there an "enjoy the view" sign on my door?
translation.fr:
Y a-t-il un panneau "profitez de la vue"
sur la porte ?

translation.en: I think not.
We're Mega Bunny hunters. We were just scouting.
translation.fr:
Nous sommes des chasseurs de méga lapins.
On en cherche.

translation.en: [groans] Just give me the spot remover.
Then I'll decide what to do with you.
translation.fr: Je déciderai de votre sort après.

translation.en: [shrieking] Oh, thank... Huh?
Mega Bunny hunters. Right.
translation.fr: Des chasseurs de méga lapins. C'est ça.

translation.en: Looked more like a burrow girl to me.
[sighs] This does not get old.
Lesson five on the surface: Looking up... gets you killed.
translation.fr:
Leçon n°5 de la surface :
regarder en l'air provoque la mort.

translation.en: [gasps] Mandu! You came back!
Here, girl!
Something's wrong.
Yeah, you're pointing a nightmare stick at a tiny pig.
translation.fr:
Oui, tu la menaces
de ta lance de cauchemar.

translation.en: How do you expect the poor thing to react?
I'm not the one who spooked her.
translation.fr: C'est pas moi qui l'ai effrayée.

translation.en: Oh, burrow girl! I figured out where you're from.
translation.fr: Coucou, fille du terrier ! J'ai deviné d'où tu venais.

translation.en: Shocker... a burrow!
You could lead us to the mother lode of humans.
translation.fr:
Tu pourrais nous conduire
au filon principal des humains.

translation.en: [frog] Ah, just a pig.
-[gasps] -[frog] Eh, at least now we have a snack.
I won't let them take her.
And risk our necks for a mute?
translation.fr: Tu nous grilles pour un mutant ?

translation.en: See, this is why I work alone.
If you like to be alone so bad, maybe you should be.
translation.fr:
Si tu tiens tant à rester seule,
n'hésite pas.

translation.en: Put the pig down right now!
Burrow girl, there you are.
Uh... That pig is a bloodthirsty killer.
translation.fr: Ce cochon est un tueur sanguinaire.

translation.en: -She'll tear you limb from limb. -Mm, yeah. I'll take my chances.
translation.fr: Elle va vous mettre en pièces. C'est ça. Je prends le risque.

translation.en: Wolf! You came back!
Yep.
[gasps] Is he dead?
No, but when he wakes up, he'll have a bad headache...
translation.fr:
Non, mais il va avoir
une sacrée migraine au réveil,

translation.en: and possibly some memory loss.
We'll hole up here.
[grunts] Normally, at night, I'd be at home doing my homework.
translation.fr: Normalement, le soir, je fais mes devoirs.

translation.en: Eating a muffin.
Not running away from homicidal frogs!
translation.fr: Je ne fuis pas des grenouilles tueuses !

translation.en: [frog] Oh... Oh, my head.
I... Wait a minute, why are you following me?
[henchman] Uh, Jamack, we're looking for those humans.
[Jamack] Oh, yeah, right. Yeah, just... duh.
Let's... let's get back to that then.
Since we've had our first fight and makeup,
that makes us officially sisters.
translation.fr: ça fait de nous des sœurs.

translation.en: -Don't. -Uh, right.
[gasps] There's a baby here.
Why is there a baby here?
We have to shut that thing up.
OK, we really need you to hush, little baby.
translation.fr: Il faut vraiment que tu te taises, bébé.

translation.en: I'll put him to sleep.
There's a slight chance this'll kill him.
translation.fr: Mais ça risque de le tuer.

translation.en: Don't you dare!
A mute? You gotta be kidding me!
It's still a baby!
[Jamack] Check every room!
Do you know any grub nursery rhymes?
translation.fr: Tu connais des comptines de larves ?
